summary: 该插件用于检测致远互联系统的 wooyun 2015-148227 漏洞，通过访问特定路径尝试获取 web.xml 文件内容以确认漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect the wooyun 2015-148227 vulnerability in Seeyon systems by accessing a specific path to attempt retrieving the web.xml file content to confirm the existence of the vulnerability.
